pullrequest.title: Fix sonar test and deprecation warning

content.raw:
Right, it is out of our weekly testing errors report too. Jenkins views (tabs) are only enable for 1.9 and 2.1.

By other side, we usually leave jenkins jobs enabled for all versions. They should not be getting updates, so no new runs unless there is a failure in network. We can safely disable them.
content.html:
Right, it is out of our weekly testing errors report too. Jenkins views (tabs) are only enable for 1.9 and 2.1.

By other side, we usually leave jenkins jobs enabled for all versions. They should not be getting updates, so no new runs unless there is a failure in network. We can safely disable them.
